nodes.text: A ceremonial table was a table used in religious ceremonies by the residents of Kerritamba Village in the Kkowir Forest on Kashyyyk. It was the first piece of the "Nyenthi'Oris Gifts" collection along with a ceremonial chair and a mystical centerpiece.

Ceremonial tables first appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
